user_query: I'm a fitness enthusiast and I'm looking for effective workout routines to build muscle and improve endurance. Can you provide me with a variety of workout plans targeting different muscle groups? Also, suggest some healthy protein-rich recipes to support my fitness goals.

TaskList.description: Gather various workout routines that target different muscle groups.
Provide a detailed outline of each workout routine including exercises, sets, and reps.
Collect healthy, protein-rich recipes suitable for muscle building.
List nutritional information for each recipe to support fitness goals.
